status: Minor Delays reason for status change due to signal failure at East Putney. For the journey from Wimbledon to Parsons Green, this is a relevant disruption so status is still Minor Delays. The reason is a shortened version of the TFL reason text, without mentioning other areas of the line that are unaffected. The original TFL status was Minor Delays. The original TFL reason was District Line: Minor delays between Wimbledon and Parsons Green while Network Rail fix a signal failure at East Putney. GOOD SERVICE on the rest of the line.
reason: Minor delays between Wimbledon and Parsons Green while Network Rail fix a signal failure at East Putney.
